appDesc.message: I strongim ChatGPT wantaim ol bikpela/plen/longpela piksa + spamblock mod. Em i wok tu long perplexity.ai + poe.com!

menuLabel_modeNotifs.message: Samting ol i no save long en

helptip_fullerWins.message: Na tu, yu ken yusim bikpela piksa taim yu yusim Ful-Windo

helptip_tallerChatbox.message: Kisim bek dispela bokis long rot bilong rot

helptip_widerChatbox.message: Long hap bilong en, ol i save yusim bikpela piksa bilong soim ol samting long hap bilong en

helptip_newChatBtn.message: Soim Nupela Toktok baten insait long tokboks

helptip_hiddenHeader.message: Haitim het bilong pes bilong pes

helptip_btnAnimations.message: Mekim chatbar batens i muvim taim yu putim maus

helptip_modeNotifs.message: Toksave taim yu senisim ol modus/sait

helptip_blockSpam.message: Painim ol spam banner bilong rausim pes

helptip_chatbarSettings.message: Kontrolim ol samting i kamap long chatbar

helptip_buttonSettings.message: Pasim ol sait i gat as bilong ol bot

alert_showYourSupport.message: Em i soim olsem em i sapotim ol

alert_isOSS.message: em i wanpela program bilong ol man i save yusim ol fon bilong ol long yusim ol fon bilong ol long helpim ol narapela

alert_despiteAffliction.message: Maski em i gat bikpela hevi

alert_byDonatingResults.message: long rot bilong givim, yu helpim mi long wok yet long stretim, stretim ol hevi, putim ol nupela samting, na mekim ol program i kamap gutpela moa

alert_noMatterSize.message: i no gat wanpela samting i save kamap long bikpela bilong en

alert_directlySupports.message: mi sapotim ol wok bilong mi long mekim dispela projek i stap fri na i op long olgeta man long yusim

alert_growTogether.message: Yumi ken mekim dispela bikpela program i go bikpela wantaim

alert_pressF11.message: Presim F11 long lusim ful skrin

alert_f11reason.message: F11 i bin yusim long go insait long olgeta piksa, na long wanem, man i mas yusim wankain ki bilong lusim dispela piksa

notif_chatStopped.message: Ol i no inap mekim olsem
